description: Enjoy the perfect flavour combo of pineapple, lime and creamy coconut in this refreshing and easy-to-make granita.
keywords: Granita,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Gluten free,Egg free,Spring,Nov 2020,Sesame free,Summer,Quick & easy dessert,Halal,Soy free,Vegetarian,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Pineapple Granita Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place pineapple, coconut water, honey and juice of 1 lime in a food processor and process for 2 minutes or until smooth.
Pour mixture in a 26 x 37cm (3cm deep) metal tray. Freeze, uncovered, for 2 hours or until just starting to freeze. Using a fork, scrape mixture into centre.
Freeze for a further 1 hour and repeat scaping until mixture has completely broken up. Serve with remaining lime cut into wedges and yoghurt.
